Name.LanguageNeutralValue: Raw Disk Access and Clipboard Changes - 9, 15, 24

QueryNode.Name: Raw Disk Access and Clipboard Changes - 9, 15, 24
QueryNode.Description: Group events related to raw disk access, file stream hashing, and clipboard changes

Query.Select: *[System[(EventID=9 or EventID=15 or EventID=24) and TimeCreated[timediff(@SystemTime) <= 2592000000]]]
